13.2 Future Roadmap.Description: ObeliskOS will evolve over the next decade, integrating quantum hardware, expanding city-scale applications, and enhancing symbolic cognition through Vespa. The system will leverage Brancher and Resonator to ensure drift-free growth, maintaining lineage integrity via Snapshots and MirrorMaps.

Predictive Indices.Future Evolution Index (FEI): FEI = (Œ£_{i=1}^{n} G_i * S_i * T_i) / n, where G_i is the growth rate, S_i is the stability score, T_i is the technological readiness, and n is the number of years (10). An FEI above 0.95 is projected, with current data showing an FEI of 0.96.
